summary: The diff implements most of the requested requirements. REQ-1 backend changes are present (Student type with password field, registerStudent, studentLogin). REQ-2 hooks useStudentLogin and useStudentRegister are added in useQueries.ts. REQ-3 StudentLogin.tsx is replaced with a tabbed login/register form. One AC item is partially unverified: REQ-2 requires that on successful login, session token and student name are stored via useStudentAuth â€” the frontend page does call setStudentToken/setStudentName, but the useStudentLogin hook itself does NOT store them. The backend studentLogin returning a session token is implemented. Overall implementation is solid with minor nuances.

missing_requirements.requirement: On successful login, session token and student name are stored via useStudentAuth inside the useStudentLogin hook
missing_requirements.reason: The useStudentLogin mutation in useQueries.ts only calls actor.studentLogin and returns the result without storing the session token or student name via useStudentAuth. The storing is done in the page component (StudentLogin.tsx), not inside the hook itself as specified.

hallucinated_features.description: A migration module (backend/migration.mo) was added to handle upgrading existing Student records without passwords
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention any migration module or upgrade path for existing data. This is an extra feature added beyond what was requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Password show/hide toggle buttons (Eye/EyeOff icons) in the login and register forms
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not specify password visibility toggle functionality. This is an additional UI feature not mentioned in any requirement or acceptance criterion.

hallucinated_features.description: Minimum password length validation (at least 6 characters) on registration
hallucinated_features.reason: The acceptance criteria only require non-empty fields and 10-digit numeric mobile number validation. A minimum password length check was not requested.
